== Introduction ==

The Business Process Map was the first deliverable. It refers to activities involved in defining exactly what a business entity does, who is responsible, designing new procedures, to what standard a process should be completed.

All Inputs obtained during the presentation have been compiled and will be put to use for the remaining deliverables as well.
